title: Riven really....riot please already deal with this silly faceroll champion.
body: Seriously can we give her some appropriate cooldowns? and make  her shield scale off AP, this champion is beyond obnoxious. It is bad enough you can mash your face on the keyboard while you spam click your mouse and gib anyone in .5 seconds with insane gap closing, huge wave clear, but does she need to also be the biggest tank in the game?

replies.body: Biggest tank in the game? No. She also has the shittiest sustain early game.
Pff... jump in, do a combo, use ignite, watch the enemy die, port back to base. That's her sustain.

Honestly lee is NOTHING compared to riven, lee sin is annoying, has incredible early and mid game presence out of jungle, but riven is a flat out joke, broken, stupid face roll, perma stun you (via knock up then her stun) and 100-0 with a tripple gap closer and absurd dmg in .5 seconds, not even fed, then if somehow she failed it doesnt matter because all of her skills are already off CD and you are stunned knocked up she is shielded all over again.

Another riven QQ thread...

Bad Rivens are underpowered as fk, Good Rivens wreck faces and average Rivens are pretty balanced, I'm low plat and it's extremely rare to encounter a good Riven. I expect Riot will give Riven small nerfs after the change that's up on the pbe which makes the gap between good/bad Rivens smaller.
The change to her Q animation canceling will make it so everyone can access the best of Riven, which means Riot won't be able to have any excuse not to nerf her.

How many other champs have all 5 of their abilities (passive included) scale off of the same thing, all very well? One of her spells even gives her a bonus to that stat so it can make all of those spells even more obnoxious.
You know what that allows you to do? Hint: it involves stacking something.
Well when she rushes, {{item:3071}} , {{item:3035}} , and {{item:3142}} , I fail to see how 500 armor would help me.

At the most, Riven will have a Brutalizer in lane, because she needs her tiamat/hydra for sustain. By the time she has LW and one brutalizer item completed, you should be grouped with your team and she with hers. All you have to do then is peel for your carry and hope the carry isn't an idiot.

That's the problem right here.

Riot no longer listens to anyone other than the professional scene when it comes to nerfing, as most if not all of solo que is in fact below Diamond. Don't get salty, just know that people in Diamond tend to have a better knowledge of the game, and therefore actually know what is broken and what is not.

I've been proven many times that you don't need to have much knowledge about the game to climb up the ladder.

I've seen high Diamonds who play worse than my buddies from Bronze/Silver and Silvers/Golds who could challenge Faker, yet remained in said ELO for the whole season.

Here's the problem.  When Riot says "No, trust us, we value your opinion" with a straight face, then proceeds to (seemingly) only listen to high ranked people as though the rest are small children incapable of comprehending anything important, they look really hypocritical and condescending.

Edit: If they didn't say this, the majority of people wouldn't care.
